scripts.build-global: rm -rf build/global && NODE_ENV=production webpack ./entry.js build/global/react-charts.js && NODE_ENV=production COMPRESS=1 webpack ./entry.js build/global/react-charts.min.js && echo "gzipped, the global build is `gzip -c build/global/react-charts.min.js | wc -c` bytes"
scripts.build-npm: rm -rf build/npm && babel --optional es7.objectRestSpread -d build/npm/lib ./lib/components && cp README.md build/npm && cp ./lib/components/*.css build/npm/lib && find -X build/npm/lib -type d -name __tests__ | xargs rm -rf && node -p 'p=require("./package");p.main="lib";p.scripts=p.devDependencies=undefined;JSON.stringify(p,null,2)' > build/npm/package.json
